mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BYEWORKS.TB_RESERVATION ( RESERVATION_NO, ROOM_NO, PEOPLE_COUNT, CONFERENCE_TITLE, CONFERENCE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_RENO.NEXTVAL, #{roomNo}, #{peopleCount}, #{conferenceTitle}, #{conferenceContent}, to_date(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{memberNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT RESERVATION_NO, ROOM_NO, PEOPLE_COUNT, CONFERENCE_TITLE, CONFERENCE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, R.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM TB_RESERVATION R JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE RESERVATION_NO = #{rno}
